faq.question: PIPES & PIPE FITTINGS
faq.ans: ❖All types of pipes and fiiitngs including guide rails, connectors, flanges etc. Material available in Steel/Aluminium and PVC.
faq.ans1: ❖Pipes: Stainless Steel, Carbon Steel, Galvanized Steel, Aluminium, Brass/Copper & PVC
faq.ans2: ❖ Fittings: Threaded,Butt Weld, Socket Weld, Compression (High Pressure and Low Pressure)

faq.question: FITTINGS
faq.ans: Elbow, coupling, union, reducer, olets, tee, cross, plug nipple.

faq.question: ELECTRO-MECHANICAL
faq.ans: Pressure/ Temperature Chart Recorders, Single & Dual Pen, Charts and Recorder Pen

faq.question: SAFETY
faq.ans: Personal Protective Equipment: Goggles, Helmets, Gloves, Coverall, Shoe, Masks and it’s filters
faq.ans2: Emergency: Safety Shower, Eye Wash, Emergency Lifting Devices, Custom Made Tapes

faq.question: WELDING
faq.ans: Rods, Holders, Earth Clamps, Welding Glass, Nozzles, Tips, Gloves, Cable etc.

faq.question: OTHER GENERAL ITEMS
faq.ans: Diaphragm Pumps for Oil and Gas
faq.ans5: Mud Testing Equipment such as Mud Balances & Parts, Viscosity Funnels, Measuring Cups
faq.ans6: PH Strips, Half Area Press & Parts, Test Kits, Viscometers

faq.question: FLANGES
faq.ans: Cast Steel, Stainless Steel, Forged Steel, Flanged and Threaded

faq.question: VALVES
faq.ans: Butterfly, Gate, Globe, Check, Safety & Relief.

faq.question: LIFTING TACKLES
faq.ans: Lifting equipment and related accessories of Mild Steel, Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Galvanized Steel.
faq.ans2: Stainless Steel Link Chain & Shackles Wire Ropes, Pulleys, Cargo Nets, Trolleys, Nylon Slings and PP Ropes

faq.question: FENDER
faq.ans: Rubber Fenders, Used Tyres and Pipe Fenders.

faq.question: ELECTRICAL
faq.ans1: Cable Tray Systems & Cabling Support (Stainless Steel and Galvanized)
